content:
The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the loss of Russians in the last day, as well as their total losses since the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

DataPublicatedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces in the morning of March 20.

The losses of Russians are:

  • personnel - 433 090 (+700) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6828 (+9)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13 058 (+9)
  • artillery systems - 10 714 (+16)
  • RSWW - 1017 (0)
  • air defense facilities - 721 (1)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8355 (+37)
  • Winged missiles - 1922 (0)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14 198 (+7)
  • Special equipment - 1738 (+3).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!
title: Minus 700 invaders, destroyed armored vehicles and artistem: loss of Russian Federation per day
description: The data was published by the Armed Forces General Staff in the morning of March 20. The losses of Russians are: ...
author: Army Inform
